issue.summary: Incorrect orientation for AC215220.2
issue.description: AC215220.2 is in the wrong orientation (+) in GRCh37. It should be changed to (-).
issue.resolution_text: The (-) orientation of AC215220.2 within this scaffold corrects it's orientation in GRCh37 chromosome NC_000002.11

issue.summary: Set orientation for AC233266.3 (CH17-257B11)?
issue.description: AC233266.3 should have minus orientation within chromosome 2.
issue.resolution_text: AC233266 will be removed from the TPF b/c it represents a different haplotype. Orientation does not need to be set at this time.

issue.summary: A possible indel in AC012362 afftects an alternative first coding exon of the PTH2R gene
issue.description: An alternative first coding exon of the PTH2R gene contains an [A] that is not found in the 5 pieces of supporting transcriptional evidence; this indel causes a frameshift.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF495708.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC012362.7 and correcting this indel.

issue.summary: A possible genome sequencing error in AC018738.4 affects the translation of the ARMC9 gene
issue.description: A possible genome sequencing error in AC018738.4 affects the translation of an alternative splice variant of the ARMC9 gene
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF510794.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC018738.4 and correcting this indel.

issue.summary: AC206420.3 has ~6kb of unique sequence to the Reference
issue.description: AC206420.3 has 6,086bp unique sequence when compared to the Reference.
issue.resolution_text: This patch involving AC206420.3 (ABC10-48936800O12) represents an alternate haplotype from GRCh37 component AC108512.4. It has a 6087 bp insertion relative to reference component AC108512.4.

issue.summary: Chr. 2 CHORI-17 Pathway: DDX11L gene family may have missing copies in the Reference Build (2q13/14.1)
issue.description: A clone has been selected for sequencing that align near the AL078621.19 region of Chr. 2. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 pathway does not meet the criteria to replace the Reference or for alt_loci creation.

issue.summary: Chr. 2 CHORI-17 Pathway: C2orf27B may have missing copies/may be mis-represented in the Reference Build (2q21)
issue.description: Clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC103564.5 region of Chr. 2. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 pathway does not meet the criteria to replace the reference or for alt_loci creation.

issue.summary: Confirm scaffold3263_34750_54942.0:31-12154 is a correctly assembled human sequence.
issue.description: Confirm that scaffold3263_34750_54942.0:31-12154 is a correctly assembled human sequence. This is a YH1 scaffold described in PMID: 19997067 that does not align to GRCh37.p2 or to anything in NR.
issue.resolution_text: The sequence from scaffold3263_34750_54942.0:31-12154 is confirmed as human by the overlapping alignment with AC233715 (ABC7-42760000I22)

issue.summary: GeneID: 151 (ADRA2B), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: NM_000682.5 has a 9 nt insertion (position 903-911) compared to the reference genome at position NC_000002.11:96,780,987
issue.resolution_text: KF573706.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching the 9-nt insertion found in AC092603.2 and correcting the alignment of ADRA2B.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC209560.2 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383521.1 created to capture sequence from AC209560.2 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC209560.2, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing 6080 bp more than component AC009414.4, has been uploaded to the Chr. 2 Alt-Ref-Loci TPF.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC208170.4 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383522.1created to capture sequence from AC208170.4 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC208170.4, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing ~17 kb more than component AC069137.6, has been uploaded to the Chr. 2 Alt-Ref-Loci TPF.

issue.summary: Possible issues with cosmid XXcos-2003C17/AC130223.2
issue.description: Possible issues with cosmid XXcos-2003C17/AC130223.2 in the Human Chromosome 2 TPF
issue.resolution_text: Deleted cosmid XXcos-2003C17 (AC130223.2), a component of NC_000002.11 was removed, and an end-to-end overlap between AC134873.2 and AC215220.2 was identified. The (-) orientation of AC215220.2 within this scaffold corrects its orientation in GRCh37 chromosome NC_000002.11.

issue.summary: GeneID: 3635 (INPP5D), assembly gap
issue.description: Much of RefSeq NM_005541.3 aligns across a gap in reference chr. 2 between components AC141929.2 and AC145517.3
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of WGS sequences ABBA01001995.1 and AEKP01044255.1 to this Chromosome 2 gap, INPP5D has full alignment to the Reference.

issue.summary: Possible Inversion in AC097523.4 (RP11-597P14)
issue.description: Possible Inversion in AC097523.4 (RP11-597P14)
issue.resolution_text:
This inversion occurs at coordinates NC_000002.12:138,247,430-138,251,018 (3,589bp), in component AC097523.4. CHM1 clone CH17-215F16 (AC255436.1) shows the inversion haplotype, also identified by Levy et al. 2007 (estd22), McKernan et al. 2010 (estd197) and 1000-genomes Project Consortium Structural Variation (estd59).
Since this inversion haplotype has no consequence on gene annotation/function, an ALT_LOCI containing the inversion haplotype (CH17-215F16 (AC255436.1)) will not be created.

issue.summary: GeneID: 55230 (USP40), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: USP40 (GeneID:55230) aligns poorly to reference component AC019072.7
issue.resolution_text: AC019072.8 is now submitted with orientation problem fixed.

issue.summary: AL133247.1 contains an 850bp string of 'N's
issue.description: AL133247.1 contains an 850bp string of 'N's
issue.resolution_text: Switchpoints were curated to include sequence from AL121654.1 eliminating a run of ~850 'N's in the Reference (AL133247.1).

issue.summary: Chr. 2 CHORI-17 Pathway: IGK Locus (Gene ID: 50802)
issue.description: Clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC062029.7 - AC113612.3 region of Chr. 2. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype. Further work following the release of GRCh38 can be followed now in HG-2330.
issue.resolution_text: This CHORI-17 pathway sequenced for the IgK locus has been added to the Chrom. 2 TPF for GRCh38. Further work following the release of GRCh38 can be followed now in HG-2330.

issue.summary: Chr. 2 CHORI-17 Pathway: LOC151009 (Gene ID: 151009)
issue.description: Clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC140479.3 - AC226101.3 region of Chr. 2. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 pathway does not meet the criteria to replace the reference or for alt_loci creation.

issue.summary: Curate alignment for AC130814.3 and AC092594.2
issue.description: Alignments associated with AC130814.3 and AC092594.2 in the GRC database require curation.
issue.resolution_text: A curated single alignment for the overlap between AC130814.3 and AC092594.2 has been loaded to the GRC database and marked as 'preferred'.

issue.summary: Chrom. 2 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 Reference anchor switchpoint
issue.description: Incorrect switch point in Chrom. 2 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 between the Reference anchor (AC144611.2) and the haplotype-specific clone (AC206420.3).
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint between AC144611.2 and AC206420.3 has been updated to include all of AC206420.3's sequence.

issue.summary: Reference assembly representation of CYP1B1 is not the clinical standard
issue.description: The GRCh37 representation of CYP1B1 differs from the clinical standard for this gene.
issue.resolution_text: The indel corresponding to dbSNP rs11379588 was corrected by re-submission. The mismatch corresponding to dbSNP rs1056836 is now corrected by the addition of KF459611.1 to the Chrom. 2 TPF.

issue.summary: There is a gap between components AC142528.3 and AC108488.4 in NCBI Build 36 (NC_000002.10).
issue.description: There is a gap between components AC142528.3 and AC108488.4 in NCBI Build 36 (NC_000002.10).
issue.resolution_text: AC231981.2 (ABC14-8076949H21) was sequenced and now extends off of AC114810.4 making AC142528.3 redundant. Further progress on this gap can be followed in JIRA ticket HG-709.

issue.summary: There a gap in the Reference between components AC233028.1 and AC148036.2 of GRCh37
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of ticket HG-710.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of accessioned RP11 WGS scaffold AUXG01000013.1 to the Chromosome 2 TPF, this sequence gap is now closed.

issue.summary: There a gap in the Reference between components AC232766.1 and AC174048.1 of GRCh37
issue.status_text: Looking for sequence to close this gap.
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of ticket HG-714.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There a gap in the Reference between components AC205584.1 and AC205583.1 of GRCh37.
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of ticket HG-36.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of WGS sequence AEKP01019831.1 to the Chrom. 2 TPF, this sequence gap is now closed.

issue.summary: There a gap in the Reference between components AC110080.2 and AC233264.2 of GRCh37.
issue.description: This ticket is a a continuation of gap ticket HG-716.
issue.resolution_text: Gap components for this ticket are no longer valid. A CH17 pathway replaced this region (IgK) and was added to GRCh38. Further progress of this specific gap can now be followed in HG-2271.

issue.summary: There a gap in the Reference between components AC233263.2 and AC018696.4 of GRCh37
issue.description: This issue is a continuation of gap ticket HG-717.
issue.resolution_text: Gap components for this ticket are no longer valid. A CH17 pathway replaced this region (IgK) and was added to GRCh38. Further progress of this specific gap can now be followed in HG-2273.

issue.summary: There is a gap between components AC099646.6 and AC092683.3 in NCBI Build 36 (NC_000002.10).
issue.description: There is a gap between components AC099646.6 and AC092683.3 in NCBI Build 36 (NC_000002.10).
issue.resolution_text: AC160020.1 was sequenced and closes the gap between components AC099646.6 and AC092683.3.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC153804.1 and AC233025.1 in GRCh37.
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of HG-244.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of WGS sequence AEKP01200292.1 to the Chrom. 2 TPF, this sequence gap is now closed.

issue.summary: There is a gap between components AC109815.5 and AC123886.7 in NCBI Build 36 (NC_000002.10).
issue.description: There is a gap between components AC109815.5 and AC123886.7 in NCBI Build 36 (NC_000002.10).
issue.resolution_text: AC226101.3 was sequenced and added to the TPF, closing the gap and making AC109815.5 and AC123886.7 redundant for GRCh37.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC153810.1 and AC144611.2 in GRCh37.
issue.description: This is a continuation of gap ticket HG-38.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of WGS sequences ABBA01027998.1 and AEKP01039870.1 to the Chrom. 2 TPF, this sequence gap is now closed.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC141929.2 and AC233715.2 in GRCh37.
issue.description: This is a continuation of gap issue HG-120.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of WGS sequences ABBA01001995.1 and AEKP01044255.1 to the Chrom. 2 TPF, this gap is now closed.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC093802.3 and AC233275.2 in GRCh37.
issue.description: This issue is a continuation of gap issue HG-722.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of WGS sequences ABBA01033508.1 and AEKP01044815.1 to the Chrom. 2 TPF, this sequence gap is now closed.

issue.summary: Reference component AC130223.2 of NCBI Build36 does not contain telomeric repeat (q-arm).
issue.description: There is a gap between NC_000002.10 component AC130223.2 and the telomere of Chrom. 2.
issue.resolution_text: AC215220.2 was sequenced and closes the telomeric gap in NC_000002.11 (GRCh37). Further progress on the gap created between AC130223.2 and AC215220.2 can be followed in HG-1174.

issue.summary: Chrom. 2 Pericentromeric gap
issue.description: There is a Chrom. 2 pericentromeric Gap in the Reference
issue.resolution_text: AC026273.7 (CTD-2314M3) along with a TYPE-3 gap have been added to this region. Further progress of this gap/region can be followed in HG-1697.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible base missing
issue.description: There is a missing C between chr2:31,805,882-31,805,883, creating a false frame-shift mutation in exon 1 of SRD5A2 gene. All mRNAs have C at this position.
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of HG-314. All work on this issue can be followed in HG-314. Once HG-314 is resolved, we will amend the 'Fix Version' of this ticket.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Missing copy of segmental duplication
issue.status_text: We will attempt to sequence CH17-274H21 to span the gap between AC006453 and ABBA01126667 and to represent the full segmental duplication.
issue.description: GRCh37.p10 The region 16:32,397,365-32,489,849 harbors a ~90kbp missing segmental duplication between 16p11.2 and 2p11.2, while the current human genome reference GRCh37 only represents the copy in 16p11.2.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Assembly component AC114745.6 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC114745.6 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint between AC114745.6 and AC015976.8 has been curated to include all of AC114745.6's/1K-Genomes decoy sequence.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC114808.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC114808.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint between AC114808.4 and AC225604.3 has been curated to include all of AC114808.4's/1K-Genomes decoy sequence.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC116609.6 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC116609.6 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint between AC116609.6 and AC113607.3 has been curated to include all of AC116609.6's/1K-Genomes decoy sequence.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC131097.6 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC131097.6 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint between AC114730.5 and AC131097.6 has been curated to include all of AC131097.6's/1K-Genomes decoy sequence.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Admixture mapping of decoy sequence
issue.description: AC026273.7 admixture maps to the pericentromeric region of Chromosome 2.
issue.resolution_text: AC026273.7 has been placed on the Chromosome 2 Unlocalized TPF

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Admixture mapping of decoy sequence
issue.description: AC144895.2, which admixture maps to the pericentromeric region of chromosome 2, is not in the Reference
issue.resolution_text: AC144895.2 has been placed on the Chromosome 2 Unlocalized TPF

issue.summary: Indel rs5830041 affecting a transcript of the MPV17 gene, is reported by 1000genomes as never occurring, confirmed by additional analyses.
issue.description: Indel rs5830041 is reported by 1000genomes phase1 under strict accessibility criteria as never occurring and is also confirmed by Jared Simpson's 61mer analysis. It results in a frameshift in a transcript of the MPV17 gene.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF510806.1 has been added to GRCh38 to correct the alignment of MPV17 (NM_002437.4).

issue.summary: AC144896.3 admixture maps to the centromeric region of Chromosome 2 but is not in the Reference.
issue.description: AC144896.3 (RP11-1129K24) admixture maps to the centromeric region of Chromosome 2
issue.resolution_text: AC144896.3 has been placed on the Chromosome 2 Unlocalized TPF

issue.summary: AC144896.3 is currently on the Chromosome 2 Unlocalized TPF
issue.status_text: Attempting to localize AC144896.3 to Chr. 2.
issue.description: AC144896.3 is currently on the Chromosome 2 Unlocalized TPF
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: AC026273.7, which is part of the decoy sequence, is currently on the Chromosome 2 Unlocalized TPF
issue.description: AC026273.7 is currently on the Chromosome 2 Unlocalized TPF
issue.resolution_text: AC026273.7 has been added to to the Chrom. 2 TPF, overlapping another decoy sequence (AC244133.1). Switchpoints in the overlap between AC026273.7 and AC244133.1 have been curated to include all decoy sequence from both components.

issue.summary: AC144895.2, which is part of the decoy sequence, is currently on the Chromosome 2 Unlocalized TPF
issue.description: AC144895.2 is currently on the Chromosome 2 Unlocalized TPF
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible clone misassembly
issue.description: Possible mis-assembly in AC092594.2.
issue.resolution_text: Auto-switchpoints for GRCh38 will include all of AC130814.3's sequence in this overlap, eliminating mis-assembled sequence from component AC092594.2 in the assembly.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: clone contains a rarely observed segmental duplication
issue.description: AC073081.5 contains a 2kb segmental duplication rarely/never seen in 1k-Genomes
issue.resolution_text: Review showed an error in the sequence of AC073081.5. Switchpoints for the overlap between AC073081.5 and AC109822.5 have been curated to include all of AC109822.5 for use in GRCh38.

issue.summary: AC073081.5 contains a segmental duplication not seen in the RP11 WGS sequence assembly or 1K-Genomes
issue.status_text: We plan to have RP11-310H21 re-sequenced with Miseq data.
issue.description: AC073081.5 contains a segmental duplication not seen in the RP11 WGS sequence assembly or 1K-Genomes
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: TWIST2 (GeneID: 117581) does not fully align to the Reference due to a gap on Chromosome 2.
issue.description: TWIST2 (GeneID: 117581) does not fully align to the Reference due to a gap on Chromosome 2.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of RPCI-11 WGS sequences AUXG01000015.1 and AUXG01000016.1 to the Chromosome 2 TPF, NM_001271893.2/ NM_057179.1 fully aligns to the Reference.

issue.summary: Chrom. 2 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: There is a TYPE-3 gap between components AC026273.7 and AL845331.2 of the Reference Assembly. This region is a continuation of HG-1483.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of AC244133.1/ ABC11-48288900L4 and the contig of AC244133.1/AC026273.7 being flipped for GRCh38, this gap ticket is no longer needed. Further progress on this gap can be followed in HG-2274.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC237191.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC237191.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC237191.3 was added to the Chrom. 2 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC145546.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC145546.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: Decoy sequence AC145546/RP11-1415P17 is deleted and has been removed from the Chr. 2 unlocalized TPF.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC244133.1 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC244133.1 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC244133.1 has been added to the Chr. 2 TPF, overlapping AC026273.7. Switchpoints have been curated to include all of AC244133.1's sequence.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC244167.1 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC244167.1 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC244167.1 was added to the Chrom. 2 ALT_REF_LOCI_2 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC226740.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC226740.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC226740.3 was added to the Chrom. 2 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Updated alignment eliminates use of legacy switch points and results in exclusion of sequence found in previous assemblies
issue.description: An alignment update since GRCh37 has inadvertently resulted in the exclusion of sequence found in previous assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: Switchpoints have been curated to retain sequence in AC111201.6 that is missing in auto-generated switchpoints for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC216281.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC216281.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC216281.3 was added to the Chrom. 2 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.resolution_text: AC208876.3 was added to the Chrom. 2 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: AC145546.3 is currently on the Chromosome 2 Unlocalized TPF
issue.description: AC145546.3 is currently on the Chromosome 2 Unlocalized TPF
issue.resolution_text: AC145546.3 was found to be deleted (HG-1711) and removed from the Chrom. 2 UNLOCALIZED TPF in preparation for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC229662.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC229662.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC229662.3 was added to the Chrom. 2 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Assembly contains rare allele in CHPF
issue.description: A rare allele (rs147759986) involving CHPF (Gene ID:79586 (NM_024536.5)) is found in the GRCh37 reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: Base in question is not deemed medically relevant by user. User was also forwarded basic guidelines for GRC base updates in relation to allele-frequency.

issue.summary: User reported of N's in AL121656.2 that are not annotated
issue.description: There are runs of 1000 N's in AL121656.2 sequence that is not annotated in the sequence record. The GRC is currently looking at best options to fix these 2 'N' runs in the Reference.
issue.resolution_text: CH17-210M7 has been sequenced (AC270165.1) and submitted. CH17-210M17 has been added to the Chr. 2 primary and patches TPF.

issue.summary: GeneID: 7840 (ALMS1): Reference contains a 3-nt deletion compared to NM_015120.4 in the CDS, at nt 1687 of the NM.
issue.status_text: We are currently bringing this project back online.
issue.description: The reference genome has a 3-nt deletion compared to NM_015120.4
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 728294 (D2HGDH), may be redundant
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113880 (component AC133781.4) has an alignment to sequence present on reference chr. 2.
issue.resolution_text: The status of AC133781.4 has been updated to redundant on the GRC curator page.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC018742.5
issue.description: Analysis of GU267905.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 2, suggest there may be ~2,160 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC018742.5. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of HG-2140.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.resolution_text: The updated tpf containing WGS piece AUXG01000014.1, which replaces ambiguous sequence from GRCh38 component AEKP01044255.1, has been uploaded to both the Chr. 2 PATCHES tpf and the Chr. 2 chromosome level TPF.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC base (M) in NC_000002.12: 239866291 in component AEKP01044815.1.
issue.resolution_text: The updated tpf containing WGS piece AUXG01000020.1, which replaces ambiguous sequence from GRCh38 component AEKP01044815.1, has been uploaded to both the Chr. 2 PATCHES tpf and the Chr. 2 chromosome level TPF.

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC244255.3 and AC006453.3 in GRCh38.
issue.description: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC244255.3 and AC006453.3 in GRCh38, originally described in HG-2271. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.
issue.resolution_text: AC255551.1 has been sequenced and added to both the Chr. 2 TPF and the Chr. 2 PATCHES TPF. AC255551.1 extends off of AC244255.3 by 41,740bp into the gap.

issue.summary: Fosmid alignment points to the Reference containing a 4.6kb deletion affecting NR_104359.1 (GPR1-AS).
issue.status_text: We need to determine if the Reference should represent a functional GPR1-AS gene.
issue.description: Fosmid alignment points to the Reference containing a 4.6kb deletion.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Assembly component AC009229.6 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AC009229.6 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: While the accession.version change in AC009229.6 did change switchpoints with neighboring components (AC016689.4 and AC016995.7), no sequence was changed from GRCh37 to GRCh38.

issue.summary: Chr. 2 CHORI-17 Pathway: IGK Locus (Post-GRCh38)
issue.status_text: Will check CHM1 optical map data to verify sequence.
issue.description: Work is ongoing on the IgK region of Chromosome 2. This is in the following GRCh38 coordinates: NC_000002.12:88,700,000-92,150,000.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 344558 (SH3MD4), assembly gap
issue.description: NM_001099289.1 aligns across a gap in reference chr. 2 between components AC139850.1 and AC140485.3.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of AC153804.1 to the Chrom. 2 TPF, SH3MD4 now has full alignment to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 96626 (LIMS3), may be redundant
issue.status_text: CH17-33B8, CH17-263O1, CH17-107K5 and CH17-258K8 will be sequenced here, in an attempt to cover this large inversion.
issue.description: Possible duplication of sequence on the 2 contigs comprising the region located between acc1 and acc2.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Hsa2- MGC4677/IGKV3D-7 problem region
issue.status_text: Currently in the process of sequencing single-haplotype clones from the CH17 library.
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an inversion between AC068279.6 and AC116050.3
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: inversion of sequence block in BAC AC019072.7 affecting gene USP40
issue.description: The USP40 gene is affected by a sequence inversion in BAC AC019072.7, locating the first three exons on the opposite strand from the rest.
issue.resolution_text: AC019072.8 is now submitted with orientation problem fixed.

issue.summary: Discrepancy (indel) of 1 bp between human chr2 genomic clone AC016683.7 and transcripts
issue.description: Discrepancy (missing "G" in genome) between human chr2 genomic clone AC016683.7 and transcripts affecting the PAX8 gene.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product (accession number FJ695202) has been submitted to Genbank to fix the deletion in the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 7849 (PAX8), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_003466.3 (PAX8) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: \WGS contig KF459610.1 has been generated and uploaded to the Chr. 2 TPF, fixing this base for GRCh38.

issue.summary: GeneID: 1496 (CTNNA2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_004389.2 (CTNNA2) and the reference genomic sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product (accession number FJ695201) has been submitted to Genbank to fix the 3-nt deletion in the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 6716 (SRD5A2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_000348.3 (SRD5A2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: WGS sequence AEKP01018982.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AL133247.1 and improving the alignment of SRD5A2 to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 7273 (TTN), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_133378.3 (TTN) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459616.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC023270.7 and correcting the mismatch affecting TTN's alignment to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 7549 (ZNF2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_021088.2 (ZNF2) and the reference genomic sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig KF459620.1 has been generated and uploaded to the Chr. 2 TPF, fixing this indel for GRCh38.

issue.summary: GeneID: 7840 (ALMS1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_015120.4 (ALMS1) and the reference genomic sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF573641.1 has been added to GRCh38 to patch AC074008.5 and correct the alignment of ALMS1.

issue.summary: Chr.2 Gap Problem Region #1
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is larger than reported gap size between AC144527.3 and AC140476.2.
issue.resolution_text: AC144444.2 redundant, removed from TPF, AC114808/AC255604 join certified.

issue.summary: Chr.2 Gap Problem Region #2
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC112228.3 and AC115619.3.
issue.resolution_text: Further progress on this gap can be followed in HG-1385.

issue.summary: Chr.2 Gap Problem Region #3
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC092664.2 and AC112229.4.
issue.resolution_text: AC140479 closes gap and makes AC092664 redundant.

issue.summary: Chr.2 Gap Problem Region #4
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC105402.5 and AC144611.2.
issue.resolution_text: Further progress on this gap can be followed in HG-1391.

issue.summary: GeneID: 151306 (GPBAR1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001077194.1 (GPBAR1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product (accession number FJ695195) has been submitted to Genbank to fix the deletion in the Reference.

issue.summary: AC092683.3 and AC159540.1 switchpoint/orientation problem
issue.description: AC092683.3 and AC159540.1 switchpoint/orientation problem for contig building
issue.resolution_text: Proper switchpoint alignments have been loaded for this overlap.

issue.summary: Chr. 2 gap between AC133644.3 and AC068279.6
issue.description: Poor alignment between components AC133644.3 and AC068279.6
issue.resolution_text: AC068279.6 and AC133644.3 overlap, based on alignments and optical map data (~22kb overlap). The reason for the gaps in these two components alignment is due to an annotated unresolved tandem repeat in both components.

issue.summary: GeneID:344167 (FOXI3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_001135649.1 (FOXI3) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig KF459612.1 has been generated and uploaded to the Chr. 2 TPF, fixing this base for GRCh38.

issue.summary: possible 1 bp deletion in AC068539.8 affecting FER1L5 gene
issue.description: possible deletion of G in BAC AC068539.8 affecting translation of gene FER1L5
issue.resolution_text: FER1L5 (AY461813) has been identified as a haplotypic variant. There is no apparent error in the Reference at this region.

issue.summary: Possible 1 bp deletion in AC124768.4 affecting RUFY4 gene.
issue.description: Possible deletion of a "G" in BAC AC124768.4 affecting translation or splicing of RUFY4 gene.
issue.resolution_text: There are no cDNA's or data from other species that point to an error in the Reference at this position.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible base error
issue.description: Duplicate Issue; See HG-629
issue.resolution_text: This is a duplicate issue of HG-629

issue.resolution_text: The extension of AL845331.2 from AC073464.5 adds representation for NR_024443.1, which was absent from GRCh37 NC_000002.11.

issue.summary: Missing alignment for AC144611.2 and AC108512.4
issue.description: No alignment detected for adjacent TPF components AC144611.2 and AC108512.4

issue.resolution_text: AC009242.6 is now submitted so clone problem is now fixed.

issue.description: discrepancy between genomic clone AC010896.15 and transcripts
issue.resolution_text: Since this mismatch is not an error and has no functional consequence, this issue is now resolved.

issue.description: AC007739.2 represents an uncommon nonsense allele (TGA) that results in a predicted CDS truncation for the METTL8 gene.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig KF459614.1 has been generated and uploaded to the Chr. 2 TPF, fixing this base for GRCh38.

issue.summary: discrepancy (substitution) between genomic clone AC013403.9 and CAD transcripts

issue.summary: GeneID: 23785 (ABCD1P1), missing in assembly
issue.description: NG_001246.1 does not align well to Reference
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of AC242245.1 (WI2-776N13) in the Chr. 2 TPF, ABCD1P1 now aligns to the Reference.

issue.summary: Possible HuRef WGS to fill Chr.2 gap between AC144527.3 and AC140476.2
issue.description: Sequence from HuRef WGS contig NW_001838758.1 may span the gap in Reference chromosome 2 between AC144527.3 and AC140476.2.
issue.resolution_text: AC144444.2 redundant, removed from TPF, AC114808/AC255604 join certified.

issue.summary: Possible HuRef WGS to fill Chr.2 gap between AC144525.3 and AC149644.1
issue.description: Sequence from HuRef WGS contig NW_001838870.1 may span the gap in Reference chromosome 2 between AC144525.3 and AC149644.1.
issue.resolution_text: AC145625 (RP13-622J23) picked making both AC144525 and AC144448 redundant. Gap closed in Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 50489 (CD207), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: NM_015717.2 first intron is slightly misplaced, should be at nt 120^121. GRCh37 is missing a 'G' at NC_000002.11:71062833
issue.resolution_text: The missing base has been added to the region with the error, correcting the clone and it's alignment with NM_015717.3.

issue.summary: Possible missing sequence in assembly in region of component AC010896.15 affecting GPR113
issue.description: GRCh37 may be missing ~3 kb in the vicinity of assembly component AC010896.15
issue.resolution_text: There is no error in AC010896.15. The 3302bp deletion in AC010896.15 (RP11-499P9) is valid and shown to be heterozygous in the RPCI-11 library. The insertion occurs within an intron of GPR113's (Gene ID: 165082) alignment but does not affect it's transcription.

issue.summary: GeneID: 389756 (AQP7P2), assembly gap, chromosome
issue.description: AL137070.9 may actually represent Chrom. 2 centromeric sequence
issue.resolution_text: AL137070.9 is redundant with AL845331.2 and AC073464.5 in the Chrom. 2 TPF
